text_block_list.text: One day―― On the door of the trainer's office, there was a reserved knock on the door.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
choice_data_list: I'm glad you came, Dober
Of course, Dober

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Well…… have you…… changed your mind? Do you…… still plan to support me?
choice_data_list: I'm glad you came, Dober
Of course, Dober

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I-it's not that, I just……! I just…… want to win. I want to be able to win……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……Thank you. In that case-!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Please…… Train me. So I can win.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Please…… Train me. So I can win.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: The next mock race…… I want to win it, for Trainer, because it's probably my last chance……
choice_data_list: Together, we'll win for sure

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Yeah……!!
And like that―― Together with Mejiro Dober, the harsh training for the upcoming mock race began.
And like that―― Together with Mejiro Dober, the harsh training for the upcoming mock race began.
Originally, she was someone that possessed an amazing potential. While she had that, her abilities themselves were still progressing favorably every day, but――
choice_data_list: That was a good time, Dober
That was a good time, Dober

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Is that so?…… But, yeah.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Thanks, even I thought that one just now was good. But――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: In the end, in front of a crowd…… for a real race, will I still be able to run like this? ……That's the problem, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: In the end, in front of a crowd…… for a real race, will I still be able to run like this? ……That's the problem, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ――I'm going to run 1 more lap. Time it, please.
As if saying that to keep up appearances, she dashed off. It's true, that she's carrying a deep-rooted mental problem.
choice_data_list: Even if it's small, there has to be something……

text_block_list.text: While thinking that, I once again returned to watching her run. At that moment…… I came to realize something.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa―!!
It was not only something related to the talk just now. Even during these days of training while, as the sub-trainer, I've been watching over her, this whole time she's――
choice_data_list: (Never looked at the spectator's seats, has she?)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……Isn't that how it usually is? While running, you're supposed to focus on the race, right?
choice_data_list: I think you're too focused on 『Not Looking』

text_block_list.text: Rather, by 『Not Looking』, by focusing so much on that, it seems to be the cause of her stiffness while running.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……That's……
choice_data_list: ……About the next race, before the start
……About the next race, before the start

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Before the start…… what?
choice_data_list: Just for a second, look at the spectators

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Ha?! I-I can't……! Because, I――
choice_data_list: From there, I'll be watching you
From there, I'll be watching you

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: But……!
choice_data_list: I'll be watching the 『Strong』 Dober

text_block_list.text: And like that―― finally, the day of the mock race had arrived.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Hyaaa……! There are quite a lot of spectators, aren't there～?!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: It's probably because Chief Trainer's retirement has become the subject of rumors. Recruiting Dober is probably the reason most of the trainers came.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: The difficulty she has in races is already well known but―― Even with that, just like you, she's a Mejiro Uma Musume. Attracting attention is unavoidable.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: That's right…… Dober, I wonder if she's okay……? That girl, she's always pushing herself…… if it leads to an injury……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Hmmm～……No, Ryan-oneesama. I'm sure she'll be fine.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: That's true. Today, Dober―― her demeanor seems different.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Bell-chan……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (Trainer…… she's definitely, come to watch, hasn't she? ……I want to win. I want to win, I want to win, today for sure……!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (But…… I can't, again, my heartbeat…… it's too noisy……!)
choice_data_list: Dober! Over here!
Dober! Over here!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (Ah…… I looked…… at the spectator seats……)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (They're…… over there――!)
choice_data_list: Dober! You'll be fine, you're strong!
Dober! You'll be fine, you're strong!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Ah…… how many time do you plan on saying that? Dummy……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Ah…… that's right. That person, really…… thinks that I'm……!
And so, the last mock race that Chief Trainer would be watching over her, had finally begun.
And so, the last mock race that Chief Trainer would be watching over her, had finally begun.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (The sound of my heartbeat, still hasn't settled. ……Honestly, I can't say I'm running as well as during training)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (I hate being in front of people. Their gazes, voices, presence―― all of that, every single one of them, I can't help but feel like they're laughing at my weakness……)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: But…… Aaaaaaaaaahhh!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (But, even with that! There! They're over there! People who…… believe, that I'm strong!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I am strong…… I am strong, I am strong!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I am! A strong Uma Musumeeeeeeeeee!!
(WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!)

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: First place……! Bell-chan…… that was a magnificent run……! I'm glad. With this, finally, you――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Trainer. Today…… really, thank you very much for coming.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Fufu, I should be the one thanking you. Seeing you win, made me very happy…… thanks to that, I have noooo more regrets.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: ……Ah, that's a lie, there's one more thing. Bell-chan, what do you plan to do from now on?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Well, I――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Together with this person, I plan to continue on.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……Now that we've come this far, you're not going to say 『No』, right, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: That's fine, right?…… Trainer.
And with that―― with Chief Trainer watching over us, a contract to be Mejiro Dober's trainer was signed!
And with that―― with Chief Trainer watching over us, a contract to be Mejiro Dober's trainer was signed!
